contextId.information: "Yahweh spoke his word." See how you translated this in [[:en:bible:notes:hag:01:01|1:1]]. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]])
AT: "the money you make at a job does not buy you enough" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]]).
contextId.quote: the wage earner earns money only to put it into a bag full of holes

contextId.information: This means to motivate or influence. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]]).
